name: Unstable Perspective
description:
My experiment on what it looks like if Crush Gear be made as a silly game 😋

To accelerate, you need to press left or right of your arrow-key / gamepad. Caution: it also steer the wheel too! Braking can also be done by controlling your steering (left/right key) or crashing.
For final twist, every 5 seconds the camera perspective will change between you and your enemies. Don't worry the camera will always looking at you despite all enemies are similar with you 😆
